result.name: teaching-line-candidate-database
result.notes: The Teaching Line database is used to provide personalised information and support to those interested in a career in teaching, to convert interest into application in line with NCTL key performance indicators. The data are collected via the NCTL website registration page, by phone and from events.

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: Teaching Line Candidate Database

extras.value: Data not to be released as it contains personal sensitive information which under the Data Protection Act will not be released
